author: Special Correspondent
text:
Members of Tamil Nadu Revenue Officials’ Association (TNROA),staging a demonstration on the Collectorate premises in Madurai on Wednesday.— Photo: S. James

Following the strike call given by members of Tamil Nadu Government Employees’ Association and other forums to press their charter of demands, employees at the Collectorate stayed away from work on Wednesday.

A large number of the striking employees staged a demonstration in front of the Collectorate.

They have been urging the government to scrap the new pension scheme and reintroduce the old scheme, as promised by the Chief Minister during the 2011 electioneering.
title: Stir at Collectorate
